description.name: Gleap Livechat
description.tagline: Easily integrate Gleap Live Chat into your WHMCS installation with this lightweight and user-friendly addon.
description.long: The Gleap Live Chat Addon seamlessly integrates with WHMCS, providing a secure and intelligent live chat experience for your customers. It allows for customer support, user tracking, and optional identity verification, with real-time data synchronization between WHMCS and Gleap.
features: Easily add the Gleap Live Chat widget to the WHMCS client area.
Loads asynchronously to avoid slowing down your pages.
Supports cookie-based session tracking across subdomains.
Automatically identifies logged-in customers in Gleap.
Optional Identity Verification to prevent third parties from impersonating users.
Supports Gleap user hash for secure identification.
updateContact is always executed to keep user data up-to-date.
Syncs WHMCS customer data with Gleap when the user is logged in and DataSync is enabled.
If DataSync is disabled or the user is no longer logged into WHMCS, the Gleap session is automatically cleared (clearIdentity) to prevent stale sessions.
Configure cookies, identity verification, identity secret, and data synchronization directly in WHMCS/Gleap.
